songs.title: Love Me Again (Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: James]
Make you love me again
Make you love me again

[Verse 1: Carlos]
Think a girl's at the door, and they all wanna roll, wanna roll, but I gotta say no
One girl that I'm looking for, there-there she goes
I knew you'd be back for another round
Give me a chance to lay it down

[Bridge: James]
The night is yo-o-oung
We're having fu-u-un
Show me love, hit me up;
You're so beautiful

When we dance heaven opens up
Girl I just thought that I should let you know

[Pre-Chorus: Kendall]
Baby, when the night is done I'll let you go
But I promise you'll be back for more
I wanna touch you like I did before
So baby, take my hand, take my hand

[Chorus: Logan & James]
I'mma make you love me again
(Make you love me again, love me again)
I'mma make you love me again
(Make you love me again)
I'mma make you love me again

[Verse 2: Logan]
Tell me what you like on the floor-on the floor, all night, what'cha wanna do?
Baby girl, it's up to you, up-up to you
I knew you'd be back for another round
The way that you move just knocks me down (ooh girl)

[Bridge: James]
The night is yo-o-oung
We're having fu-u-un
Show me love, hit me up;
You're so beautiful

When we dance heaven opens up
Girl I just thought that I should let you know

[Pre-Chorus: Kendall & Logan]
Baby-baby, when the night is done I'll let you go
But I promise you'll be back for more
I wanna touch you like I did before
So baby, take my hand, take my hand

[Chorus: Logan & James]
I'mma make you love me again
(Make you love me again, love me again)
I'mma make you love me again
(Make you love me again)
I'mma make you love me again

I'mma make you love me again

[Pre-Chorus: Kendall]
Baby, when the night is done I'll let you go
But I promise you'll be back for more
I wanna touch you like I did before
So baby, take my hand, take my hand

[Chorus: Logan & James]
I'mma make you love me again
(Make you love me again, love me again)
I'mma make you love me again
(Make you love me again)
I'mma make you love me again

[Outro: James]
Eh, eh, love me again
Eh, eh, love me again
Eh, eh, love me again
(Make you love me again, love me again)
Love me again
